div.pre:
üìÑ CommitMe - Conventional Commit compliance validation ------------------------------------------------------- ‚úÖ 274f733152a661b583f64a92474a5baa319427a9: feat: add the commit message body to the output messages ‚ùå d07e9737b348d56ba8db6095de62b91935dff361: feat(example?) :This is an example commit message d07e9737b348d56ba8db6095de62b91935dff361:1:14: error: Commits MUST be prefixed with a type, which consists of a noun, feat, fix, etc., followed by the OPTIONAL scope, OPTIONAL !, and REQUIRED terminal colon and space.
1 | feat(example?) :This is an example commit message | ~~ 2 | 3 | This commit message demonstrates few Conventional Commits compliance 4 | errors.
d07e9737b348d56ba8db6095de62b91935dff361:1:16: error: Commits MUST be prefixed with a type, which consists of a noun, feat, fix, etc., followed by the OPTIONAL scope, OPTIONAL !, and REQUIRED terminal colon and space.
1 | feat(example?) :This is an example commit message | ~ 2 | 3 | This commit message demonstrates few Conventional Commits compliance 4 | errors.
d07e9737b348d56ba8db6095de62b91935dff361:1:4: error: A scope MAY be provided after a type. A scope MUST consist of a noun describing a section of the codebase surrounded by parenthesis, e.g., fix(parser):
1 | feat(example?) :This is an example commit message | ~~~~~~~~~~ 2 | 3 | This commit message demonstrates few Conventional Commits compliance 4 | errors.
‚úÖ 1dcfe1609337c9bfacaeab11158caf4dc09355b7: feat: improve output messages ------------------------------------------------------- ‚ùå Found 3 Conventional Commit compliance issues.
